abstract.t: The MPLS source routing paradigm provides path control for both intra- and inter- Autonomous System (AS) traffic. For Intra-AS path control, protocols like RSVP-TE and CR-LDP are utilized. This documents outlines how MPLS routers may use the BGP labeled unicast protocol (BGP-LU) for doing traffic-engineering on inter-AS links as outlined in [I-D.filsfils-spring-segment-routing-central-epe].
